## ToastOptions interface

Display/configuration options for a toast notification.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ToastOptions 
```

Property


</th><th>

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

[assertiveness?](./blockly.toastoptions_interface.assertiveness_propertysignature.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

[Toast.Assertiveness](./blockly.toast_namespace.assertiveness_enum.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ How prominently/interrupting the readout of the toast should be for screenreaders. Corresponds to aria-live and defaults to polite.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[duration?](./blockly.toastoptions_interface.duration_propertysignature.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Duration in seconds before the toast is removed. Defaults to 5.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[id?](./blockly.toastoptions_interface.id_propertysignature.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Toast ID. If set along with `oncePerSession`<!-- -->, will cause subsequent toasts with this ID to not be shown.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[message](./blockly.toastoptions_interface.message_propertysignature.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

Text of the message to display on the toast.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[oncePerSession?](./blockly.toastoptions_interface.oncepersession_propertysignature.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Flag to show the toast once per session only. Subsequent calls are ignored.


</td></tr>
